summary: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Daniela Rocca|Stefania Sandrelli|Leopoldo Trieste|Odoardo Spadaro|Margherita Girelli|Angela Cardile|Lando Buzzanca|Pietro Tordi|Ugo Torrente|Antonio Acqua|Bianca Castagnetta|Giovanni Fassiolo|Ignazio Roberto Daidone|Francesco Nicastro|Edy Nogara|Renato Pinciroli|Daniela Igliozzi|Laura Tomiselli|Saro Arcidiacono|Renzo Marignano|Bruno Bertocci|Sara Ridolfi|Maria Grazia Spadaro
title: Divorcio a la italiana
